content:
Six people were injured in Nikolaev on Wednesday.

About thisreportedHead of the Nikolaev Regional Military Administration Vitaliy Kim.

"There are currently 6 wounded, 1 in serious condition," the statement said.

Earlier, the mayor of Nikolaev Oleksandr Senkevich reported that the strike, according to preliminary information, was caused by a ballistic missile.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of the shelling of Russia by the village of Mikhailivka of Kherson regionDiedLocal resident.
title: In Nikolaev 6 victims as a result of Russian rocket stroke
description: This was reported by the head of the Nikolaev regional military administration Vitaliy Kim. ...
author: Army Inform
